text: Carlos Pe√±a Romulo,Sr. was a Filipino diplomat, soldier, and journalist. He was the first Filipino to become president of the United Nations General Assembly. He also served as Secretary of Foreign Affairs in the Philippines under Manuel Quezon up to former president Ferdinand Marcos. Under Diosdado Macapagal, he became secretary of eductation. ==References== Category:Filipino politicians Category:1899 births Category:1985 deaths Category:People from Central Luzon Category:Filipino diplomats
title: Carlos P. Romulo
